about_the_game:
The OMEGA CUSTOMIZATION SET is a large DLC set that includes all 70 anime game collaboration accessory parts and a custom voice that allows you to change the voice of the navigation AI to a special version.
*The main game is not included.

● Included contents
- SAMURAI MAIDEN collab Accessories parts (7 heroine camouflages, 7 decals)
- BULLET GIRLS collab Accessories parts (8 heroine camouflages, 8 decals)
- OMEGA LABYRINTH collab Accessories parts (7 heroine camouflages, 7 decals)
- DREAM C CLUB collab Accessories parts (13 heroine camouflages, 13 decals)
- Custom voice: Enthusiastic AI (VA. Nobuyuki Hiyama)
- Custom voice: Young Lady AI (VA. Kikuko Inoue)
- Custom voice: Rich Lady AI (VA. Hekiru Shiina)
- Custom voice: Berserker AI (VA. Tomoko Kaneda)

*These contents are also included in the CUSTOM MECH WARS ULTIMATE EDITION. Please be careful not to purchase the same content twice.
